features: SET INCLUDES: 7” frying pan and 10” frying pan
HEALTHY CERAMIC NONSTICK: Our healthy and easy-to-clean ceramic nonstick coating is derived from sand and delivers effortless release with quick cleanup
TOXIN-FREE: Our coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium so you can make every meal healthier
STAY-COOL HANDLES: Soft Grip Bakelite handles are designed to stay cool on the stovetop for maximum comfort
WOBBLE-FREE BASES: Each frypan is reinforced with a wobble-free base for extra strength and even heating
EASY TO CLEAN: Dishwasher safe, but most messes wipe away
SNAG-FREE INTERIORS: The rivetless interiors prevent food buildup and make cleaning simple
EFFORTLESS PERFORMANCE: Delivers on all stovetops, except induction and oven safe up to 350˚F
MADE WITH RECYCLED ALUMINUM: Cookware vessels (excluding handles) are made from a minimum of 65% recycled aluminum
body.description: The Soft Grip collection is all about comfort and control. Designed for effortless performance and cleanup, this set features our toxin-free ceramic nonstick coating, which is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. GreenLife’s healthy ceramic nonstick is not stuck in the past—that’s why our ceramic nonstick starts with sand and creates 60% less CO2 emissions during the curing phase than traditional coatings. The cookware vessels (excluding handles) are made from a minimum of 65% recycled aluminum. Finished in vibrant colors, this set is outfitted with stay-cool handles to keep your cooking comfortable. For all stovetops, except induction. Oven safe to 350°F. Dishwasher safe. This set includes: 7” frying pan and 10” frying pan.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GreenLife Soft Grip Non-Toxic Ceramic Nonstick 2-Piece Frying Pan Set

Cook in Color! GreenLife Soft Grip This Soft Grip frying pan set is all about comfort, control, and color. Featuring stay-cool handles, our vibrant Soft Grip frying pan set is designed to make easy cooking even easier. This pair features our signature ceramic nonstick coating that starts with sand to give you effortless nonstick performance without PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. Crafted from recycled aluminum, the two sizes give you everything you need to start making everything healthier. Easy to Clean! Healthy Ceramic Nonstick GreenLife's healthy ceramic nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. What's that mean for you? No toxic fumes, even if it's overheated. The same great performance as traditional nonstick, just without the nasties. Our Most Comfortable Handle! Stay-Cool Comfort Grip Soft Grip's Bakelite handles make for cozy and comfortable cooking. Get More from Your Pans! Oven Safe Up to 350°F Take your cooking from the stovetop to the oven with Soft Grip's ready-for-anything design. Big Messes Don't Stand a Chance! Dishwasher Safe Soft Grip has a rivetless interior to make cleanup simple. When things get really messy, though, it's easy to toss it in the dishwasher. Make Everything a Little Greener! Recycled Aluminum Bodies These pots and pans are made from recycled aluminum and reinforced with wobble-free bases for extra strength and even heating. Designed to perform perfectly on gas and electric stovetops.
Watch Our GreenLife Soft Grip Collection in Action!

Previous page Tough & Vibrant Crafted from recycled aluminum, this quick-heating construction offers instant results. Ceramic Nonstick Our healthy ceramic nonstick is derived from sand and free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. Comfortable Grip Soft Grip features stay-cool handles to keep your cooking comfortable. Forged Base Thick, durable forged bases prevent these pans from warping and wobbling over time. Next page Frying Pans Made to Last 1 Body 2 Coating 3 Handle 4 Base
Get the Most Out of Your Pan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NONTOXIC AND NONSTICK!
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my cookware to a ceramic nonstick pots and pans set, and it has truly revolutionized my cooking experience. This exceptional set deserves a five-star review for its outstanding performance, durability, and ease of use. Here's why I highly recommend it.First and foremost, the nonstick properties of the ceramic coating are remarkable. Cooking with these pots and pans is a breeze, as food effortlessly glides across the surface without sticking. It allows for healthier cooking with minimal or no oil, making it an excellent choice for those looking to reduce their fat intake. Cleaning up is a joy, as even stubborn food residue can be easily wiped away with minimal effort.The superior heat distribution and retention of this ceramic cookware set ensure even cooking results. Whether I'm simmering sauces, sautéing vegetables, or searing meats, the pots and pans consistently deliver reliable and uniform heat distribution. This ensures that my dishes are cooked to perfection every time, without any hot spots or uneven cooking.The durability of the ceramic nonstick coating is worth highlighting. Even with regular use, the coating remains intact, showing no signs of peeling or flaking. This longevity is a testament to the high-quality craftsmanship and materials used in the construction of these pots and pans. I appreciate that I can rely on this cookware set for years to come, knowing that it will withstand the test of time.Additionally, the versatility of this ceramic nonstick set is impressive. It is compatible with various stovetops, including gas, electric, ceramic, and induction. This makes it suitable for a wide range of kitchen setups. The set also includes different-sized pots and pans, catering to different cooking needs and allowing for flexibility in meal preparation.Furthermore, the aesthetic appeal of this cookware set is worth mentioning. The sleek and modern design adds a touch of elegance to my kitchen. The pots and pans have a sturdy construction and comfortable handles that stay cool during cooking, providing a secure grip and enhancing overall usability.In conclusion, the ceramic nonstick pots and pans set delivers an exceptional cooking experience. Its nonstick properties, even heat distribution, durability, and versatility make it a standout choice for both novice and experienced cooks. Cleaning up is effortless, and the set's longevity ensures a worthwhile investment. With its appealing design and superior performance, this ceramic cookware set has truly elevated my cooking endeavors. I highly recommend it to anyone in search of high-quality cookware that simplifies cooking and enhances culinary outcomes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty pans and super non-stick! Nice weight.
reviews.reviewText: We got the lavender set of 16, = 3 pots, 4 pans, 5 lids, 4 low quality utensils that melt if leaned on edge while cooking.To not damage the pans, don’t use on temp higher than medium! You really won’t need to turn the burned over 5 (medium). All cooking temps are about one notch lower than in our old pans. The utensils that are included, Would be great IF they didn’t MELT and/or SNAP in half the second use. It says to use oil or butter every time, you need like a dime sized drop. If you don’t, and something sticks, put a half tsp water in the pan and cover with the lid for 15-30 seconds, it will be unstuck. It’s a whole new slippery game when trying to flip things. Like an egg, you will want a fork to hold it still while you get a spatula under it. The handles are comfortable and the weight of the pans make it easy to toss diced potatoes up and over for flipping. Things cook more evenly in these than my old pans, and clean up is crazy easy. Toss a napkin in the grease, soak it up, wipe clean let the cool!! Then and wash with soft dishrag. We had issues with first shipping because color we ordered was unavailable, but second color choice finally arrived. We are enjoying this lavender color. Even though the coloring varies from pans to pot. The pans are mostly the same pinkish-lavender shade but the big pot is way different shade of pale flat light lavender. One bummer about this set is the lack of a large frying pan, my old set had a big 13 inch frying pan and the largest one in this set is like 10 inches. The tall sides on the largest frying pan are a nice feature.Yesterday I told my S.O. that these pans are my favorite “house needs” purchase that we have made since the vacuum. I give these pans a 4 3/4 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome cookware set!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the smaller set as a Christmas gift for my daughter at first. Since I had to do a return on this item I upgraded to the bigger set. It was reasonably priced, fast delivery! My daughter is very pleased with the set! You barely have to wash anything off the pans. Everything literally glides off! Great all around cooking heat! Best thing for a person who loves to cook daily! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these, they cook beautifully, great non stick, clean up is literally rinse it while hot. My only words of caution are that they scratch easily, DO NOT use metal utensils or store where they can get banged up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got these as a replacement for my T-Fals after two different roommates and myself unknowingly destroyed the Teflon coating on them. I'm being much more careful with this set and will not be using high heat or putting them in a dishwasher. That all said; these are not only cute but also very easy to cook with and super easy to clean. I have one of those older style ranges with the heating coils and it did scratch up the bottom of my saucepan a bit, but a bit of scratch on the paint on the bottom of the pan isn't a huge deal to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice pots and pans
reviews.reviewText: Well made, nice weight, food just slides so easy and cleans well and keeps it's finish nice when cleaned.
Fue regalo y le encanto muy bonitas las ollas y sobre todo no se les pega nada fue una exelente compra valen lo q costaron y me llegaron antes de lo esperado

reviews.reviewTitle: Están hermosos, el color y nada se les pega, es una muy buena inversión
reviews.reviewText: No me gustó que una de las dos piezas fuera más pequeña de lo que pensé pero está perfecto

The pan is now unusable after a month of use, everything sticks even on medium with oil with constant stirring, despite handwashing with sponge and using no metal utensils on it. Warranty is unclaimable they send you canned responses about how it's your fault. Save yourself the headache and don't buy this.
Muy bonita, justo como viene en la imagen, llevo un mes con ella y no se ha rayado ni nada por el estilo, buenos materiales
